title: [Ruins, Stairwell]
description: The stone of the pathways and platforms appears freshly cleaned here.  A stairwell leads down to the calm waters of the atoll below, coils of rope flanking either side.

The stone of the pathways and platforms appears freshly cleaned here.  A stairwell leads down into the calm waters of the atoll below, coils of rope stacked neatly on either side at the end of the stairs.
